OK gang. Time once again for your picks for your favorite NFL teams.
 
 Bills are the 9 point underdogs, but as a hometown fan I'll pick them.

sorry I missed this. Too busy with fantasy baseball playoffs :)
 
 I'll try to do picks next week if you post a thread then.
Jake Plummer threw three interceptions. I mean, I love Jake, but it's time to move on.

Yep. I'm a Bronco fan and that game was ugly. He played really well (well besides the game that actually counted :)) last year, but if this is how he's going to be they need to look at a new QB. I mean I like the fact that he can roll out and make something happen, but on the other hand he tries to make something out of nothing too much. Oh well, I was expecting big things from them this year, at least a return to the playoffs. But not if they keep playing like they did Sunday.

 I didn't realize you were a Bronco fan too. Awesome :) . I wasn't able to watch the game, it wasn't broadcast where I am. They rarely are being Kansas City and all, which is dissappointing. Whether or not they make it to the playoffs depends on Jake, but also Mike Bell's performance. How did he do?
